sub_fields.label: Service carousel items
sub_fields.name: service_carousel_items
sub_fields.instructions: Number of service carousel items to display. Specifying 0 will display all carousel items.

sub_fields.label: Custom App SMS Link (for desktop users)
sub_fields.name: custom_app_sms_link

sub_fields.label: Remove container padding
sub_fields.name: remove_container_padding
sub_fields.instructions: Used to remove outer padding if multi type slides are used (Image and text for example)

sub_fields.label: Showcase background color
sub_fields.name: showcase_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: If no background image is used, specify a background color

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon_list_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Enter html for icon: eg.
